Html:
Hi everyone,
I'm trying to figure out if it is legal to use the Google Maps and/or the OpenStreetMap service through the library. I need to embed the library in a commercial application.
Reading the OpenStreetMap and Google Maps policies (https://operations.osmfoundation.org/policies/tiles/ and https://developers.google.com/maps/terms), it seems it is not possible.

Can someone help me figure out if I can use those services? If I can't, why the library still provides them?

Thanks
